page.title: 06Kirkconnel:Junior Recreation
page.content: !st.Kelloholm Guides:-so called since they meet in Kelloholm Primary School, the school which serves the combined communities of Kirkconnel & Kelloholm. The company currently numbers 20 girls between the ages of 10 and 14. The Girl's Brigade: The Boy's Brigade:church-sponsored groups which meet in St. Mark's Church Hall(St.Mark's was combined with St. Conal's within the last 5years due to falling membership) Athletics Club:-using Kelloholm Pr. school this club meets through-out the year preparing the youngsters for inter-club competitions. Country Dancing:-toddlers and juniors attend separate classes in the school hall where the rudiments of Scottish Country Dance are taught. Football:-extremely popular with the boys.
